sentence.Network_en: Would you like to see the movie Forget Me Not?

sentence.Network_en: Sweet, figure - flattering two - piece in feathery pink with dainty forget - me - not print all over.
sentence.Network_cn: 甜, 图 - 恭维两件粉红色的羽毛与讲究勿忘我,而不是打印所有.

sentence.Network_en: The lovely little forget - me - not has long been an emblem of love and remembrance.
sentence.Network_cn: 可爱姣小勿忘我花一直是爱和回忆的象征.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: translating the Old French name ne m'oubliez mye; said to have the virtue of ensuring that the wearer of the flower would never be forgotten by a lover

entry.tran: 勿忘我，勿忘草（一种开蓝色小花的植物）
entry.def: A forget-me-not is a small plant with tiny blue flowers.

means.word_mean: 1. small perennial herb having bright blue or white flowers
